ygData.subject: Weapons for sale and Trade on Bertox
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the following items which might be of interest to warriors on Bertox 1 2-handed dwarven axe - Damage of 14 and Delay of 43 non-magical 1 Shiny Brass
ygData.messageBody:
I have the following items which might be of interest to warriors on Bertox

1 2-handed dwarven axe - Damage of 14 and Delay of 43 non-magical
1 Shiny Brass Halberd - Damage 16 and Delay of 48 magical

I am looking to trade the shiny brass halberd for a blackened iron bastard sword

I am also willing to entertain a trade for a BBC. I prefer swords, but got the Halberd because it was easier. Befallen was plagued by newbies falling down the well and starting nasty trains of necromancers and I am unfamiliar with Runnyeye. It is completely empty most of the time, and no place to explore without a full party and guide.

If you know the details of getting the blackened iron bastard sword and are willing to become part of party to obtain it, I will give you my share of the loot obtained on the trip. I have others I can recruit for the trip so we could have a full party.

Regards,
Bael
Warrior of the Indigo Brotherhood
Arm of Innoruuk
